title: Starguardian quiz icon
body:
Hello,
So i finished the quiz multiple times now and everytime i enter the last choice and click "redeem the icon" (or something like that) button it does some redirecting throught the page that says u succesfuly redeemed the icon. But then it just gets me throught the login page and back to the quiz page. If i go back it says "invalid request. (400)"... and i dont see the icon in game is it a bug or does it take time to get this icon and i will get it eventualy even that error message is present... (The page about getting the icon doesnt stay up more than a second sometimes even less).
thanks for your response :)

replies.body: The Icon can take a few days to be delivered to your account, and the hard deadline is a week. If you don't see anything after a week has passed, let me know.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4AQAaNuY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-12T03:15:32.444+0000)
>
> The Icon can take a few days to be delivered to your account, and the hard deadline is a week. If you don't see anything after a week has passed, let me know.

Hello,
i just checked again and the icon isn't on my account yet. Looks like i posted this on NA boards i hope thats okey im one EUNE... Thanks for the reply.

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll get back at you with a support specialist who can work with you to resolve this.

Let me know if you encounter any issues making that ticket.
